checkers

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkPlayer, PlayfieldPanel

    public interface Player
    This interface has to be attached to every player(e.g. : NNs, AIs, Humans) in order to ensure that every neccessary method is implemented.

    Author:
    Till Brinkmann, Marco Adamczyk

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptDraw()
      This method is called in a player if a draw is requested by the other player.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the player.
      void prepare(Figure.FigureColor color)
      This method gives the Player the neccesary information, so that the Player can set up itself for the next move.
      void requestMove()
      This method is called by the gamelogic and should be the method in which the player is calculating his move.
      void saveInformation(java.lang.String directory)
      Here the player can save its information after the game in a file.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        void prepare(Figure.FigureColor color)
        This method gives the Player the neccesary information, so that the Player can set up itself for the next move.

        Parameters:
        color - A variable from the enum FigureColor.

      • requestMove

        void requestMove()
        This method is called by the gamelogic and should be the method in which the player is calculating his move. It is required that this method calls makeMove in gamelogic with the parameter of the move that the player wants to make.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the player.

        Returns:
        A string of characters that represent the name of the player

      • acceptDraw

        boolean acceptDraw()
        This method is called in a player if a draw is requested by the other player. This method allows the player to calculate if a draw is a reasonable choice and returns a value with regard to that decision.

        Returns:
        A boolean the determines if a requested draw will be accepted by the player.

      • saveInformation

        void saveInformation(java.lang.String directory)
        Here the player can save its information after the game in a file. It should be saved in the given directory.

        Parameters:
        directory - A file to a directory.
